quickstart_arrival.title: Quickstart: Arrival Platform
quickstart_arrival.text: A quiet platform hangs over the inner sea, marked with painted arrows and a warm lantern. A guide waves you in, ready to walk you through the essentials before you step into the wider archipelago.

choices.text: Follow the guide toward a short walkthrough.
Pick up the starter kit laid out on the bench.
Exit onboarding and head straight to the tutorial island.

quickstart_controls.title: Quickstart: Controls
quickstart_controls.text: The guide points to a slate: press the number beside a choice to move forward. Open the inventory with I, options with O, and quit with Q whenever you need a break.

choices.text: Continue to the starter kit station.
Exit onboarding and head straight to the tutorial island.

quickstart_kit.title: Quickstart: Starter Kit
quickstart_kit.text: A set of travel tokens and a simple badge sit in a tidy tray. The badge marks you as a {tag:Scout} for the rest of the onboarding arc.

choices.text: Take the Scout badge and travel tokens.
Leave the kit for someone else and move on.
Exit onboarding and head straight to the tutorial island.

quickstart_routes.title: Quickstart: Two Routes
quickstart_routes.text: Two walkways leave the platform. The upper rail is narrow but fast, while the lower ramp is wide and open to everyone.

choices.text: Use the lower ramp and keep a steady pace.
Exit onboarding and head straight to the tutorial island.

quickstart_signal.title: Quickstart: Signal Post
quickstart_signal.text: At the end of the route a small signal post hums, waiting for a decision. It records simple flags you can check later with the tags/flags overlay.

choices.text: Raise the signal to mark your readiness.
Leave the post untouched and move on.
Exit onboarding and head straight to the tutorial island.

quickstart_departure.title: Quickstart: Departure Gate
quickstart_departure.text: A final arch opens toward the wider Startways. You have practiced movement, tags, items, and flagsâ€”just enough to step into the full world.

ending_quickstart_exit.title: Quickstart Complete
ending_quickstart_exit.text: You sign off at the edge of the Startways, confident in the basics. The archipelago waits for your return.

endings.ending_quickstart_exit: Complete the quickstart onboarding and pause before the wider journey.
